python:
from event_manager import *
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
import time

event_manager.reset()

def on_event_timer_callback_w_E_K_n_H():
  global led_state
  if led_state == 0:
    display.set_all('#ff0000')
    led_state = 1
  else:
    display.set_all('#000000')
    led_state = 0

event_manager.add_timer_event(500, on_event_timer_callback_w_E_K_n_H)

def on_event_condition_callback_u_y_x_B_n():
  global led_state
  print('Delay for 5s')
  time.sleep_ms(5000)
  print('Delay done')

event_manager.add_condition_event(lambda:(pin0.is_touched()), on_event_condition_callback_u_y_x_B_n)

if True:
  print('Start...')
  led_state = 0

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(50)
